availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Gunboat (U.S.A.). Sidewheel steamer purchased by the United States War Department and converted into a gunboat in Cincinnati, Ohio, in 1861. Commissioned by the U.S. Navy from August 12, 1861, to July 2, 1865. Purchased by Thomas Scott and Woodburn on August 17, 1865.

ab.bibl: Naval History and Heritage Command, "Dictionary of American Naval Fighting Ships," Lexington III (sidewheel steamer) 1861-1865, https://www.history.navy.mil/research/histories/ship-histories/danfs/l/lexington-sidewheel-steamer-iii.html (accessed June 28, 2019).
